hiveArticle.title: INCREDIBLE MAIL FROM AN AMAZING COMMUNITY - YOU'VE GOTTA SEE THIS!
hiveArticle.body:
http://i.imgur.com/HGoKK5s.jpg

## <center>Steemians never cease to amaze me!</center>

-----------
I let my mail build up a little bit to make this video, but I think that it was worth the hard time I had waiting!

https://img1.steemit.com/0x0/http://i.imgur.com/uVNBbyL.jpg
## <center>VIDEO - PAPA OPENS THE MAIL!</center>

https://youtu.be/i-Y1WNLfRp8

https://img1.steemit.com/0x0/http://i.imgur.com/uVNBbyL.jpg

### <center>For those of you who don't watch the videos, I'll give you a quick rundown of what I received.</center>

-----------
## <center>@liberty-minded</center>

http://i.imgur.com/JStSRRN.jpg

This guy knew that I like hot sauce, so he spent over $20 just on shipping to send me a bottle of his favorite kind! Please join me in thanking @liberty-minded for his generous gift! Thanks man!

https://img1.steemit.com/0x0/http://i.imgur.com/uVNBbyL.jpg

## <center>@jonny-clearwater</center>

http://i.imgur.com/FlBXJO5.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/2num6ax.jpg

This incredible t-shirt was sent as a trade that we worked out. I sent him one of my handmade "DON'T POST FOR FREE - steemit.com" shirts and he mailed me one of these that he designed! Very cool stuff and an excellent trade. Check out @jonny-clearwater and/or his wife @flowerpowerart if you have not already done so. Thanks! I'll be wearing it!


https://img1.steemit.com/0x0/http://i.imgur.com/uVNBbyL.jpg

## <center>@louiscpt</center>

http://i.imgur.com/DGikP3A.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/EbQx5AN.jpg

A huge pile of gifts came to me all the way from South Africa. Check out the personalized envelope, and the interesting stamps. If that wasn't enough, you'll have to look at what was inside!

--------------
http://i.imgur.com/II02R73.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/Moh5Nrm.jpg

First off, I received this incredible, personalized, embroidered long-sleeve STEEM-POCALYPSE shirt! This was huge! What a gift!

-----------------
http://i.imgur.com/UIbFzLL.jpg

Then, there was this amazing STEEM-POCALYPSE hat that not only featured my favorite color (camouflage) but it also actually fit on my giant head! Super cool.

--------------
http://i.imgur.com/McxJy6n.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/gwfG0la.jpg

And.... if that wasn't enough (and it was) I also found this fantastic t-shirt inside. Another personalized shirt featuring the STEEM-POCALYPSE logo, the @papa-pepper logo, *and* a photo of me holding one of my Wild Friends, the Pygmy Rattlesnake! This was mind-blowing! What a great set of gifts! You guys should definitely check out what else @louiscpt has been up to on his blog page.

https://img1.steemit.com/0x0/http://i.imgur.com/uVNBbyL.jpg
## <center>PAPA LOVES THIS STUFF!</center>

I know that even though I've been on steemit for almost a year now I am still a newcomer to online interaction and social media. I also know that many may consider giving out mailing addresses and meeting people from the internet in person to be some big "no-nos." However, I'm still new at all of this, and so far the steemit community has seriously impressed me.

These gifts are just one small example of how steemit has taken things to an entirely different level that what so many other online platforms have achieved. Honestly, I am so blessed to be a part of this steemit community and you guys mean a lot to me. Steem on my friends, steem on!

https://img1.steemit.com/0x0/http://i.imgur.com/uVNBbyL.jpg

## As always, I'm @papa-pepper and here's the proof:
http://i.imgur.com/JBFNKlm.jpg
proof-of-some-of-the-best-mail-ever

--------------
----------
#### <center>Until next time…</center>
